description:
My place is close to Ralph Avenue Train Station. Located in the historic neighborhood lots of restaurants. Twenty minutes from Manhattan. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the location, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Very easy to get around apartment located on the same block as the A and C train. We are 20 minutes from Manhattan and 15 minutes from Barclay Center. One the next block there is also the 25 and 47 bus. The long island railroad is 10 minutes away.
name: 2 Bedroom Apt.-30 secs from C train
review: Wonderful location in Brooklyn. Clean and simple apartment, perfect for a base to adventure around NYC. Right on a subway line.
